description:
For thousands of years people relied on the scriptures to describe how we came to find ourselves on this planet. Then, almost two hundred years ago, we altered our ideas about our origins when Charles Darwin published - 'The Origin Of The Species'. Since then, most of us have agreed that we have about a five billion year long story of how we got here and it all has been proven more or less by our DNA. But, today, we discover that our DNA is composed of much smaller atomic and sub-atomic particles and that all of these evolved from the first moments of The Big Bang. This course puts together all of these historic theories of our Creation and makes sense out of them based on the most modern and most accepted new scientific evidence.

by Michael Mathiesen - Author of The God Particle Bible - The Force Equation - The Doomsday Watch and over fifty titles based on Science and the latest Scientific Discoveries.
title: The Origin Of Creation - The Big Bang Theory
